title: Edoten Men’s Denim Yukata Made in Japan Kimono Japanese Traditional Samurai Robe/Haori Denim Coat
features: ONE SIZE FITS ALL MEN ! Height 165cm-180cm (5ft 4in-5ft 10.87in) Yukata is a casual Kimono, which is one of the traditional Japanese garments. Its fabric is made in OKAYAMA: The cradle of Japanese civilization. Made in JAPAN. 100% Denim cotton.Very comfortable to wear. Include original obi belt. Please check more information below!
OKAYAMA is one of the best denim producing areas in Japan.The design is comfortable and the quality is very good.

What is Yukata? One of the most popular garments of traditional Japanese clothing. It is a casual kimono! It is commonly used in summer to see the fireworks and go to festivals. In addition, Japanese people usually wear it for relaxing and sleeping in traditional hotels (Ryokan) such as hot springs. (Onsen).

Very useful type of yukata “KINAGASHI” The type of this yutaka is for a casual wear to go out, which is called “Kinagashi”. Just wear, tie a obi belt and ready to go! You also can use it as a short coat for kimono or yukata, which is called Hakama in Japanese.

Authentic cotton fabric MADE IN JAPAN. The cotton fabric is made in OKAYAMA, Japan. It is authentic and classy. In addition, the yukata is made in Japan. It provides sophisticated and elegant men’s look.
